        public boolean isPointInside​(int x,
                             int y)
        The is point inside value checks if the point passed into the method is inside the entity.
        Parameters:
        x - integer x coordinate of the point you are checking.
        y - integer y coordinate of the point you are checking
        Returns:
        Boolean whether the point is inside the method or not.
